00040 template <typename P1 = void,
00041           typename P2 = void,
00042           typename P3 = void>
00043 class kernel {
00044         private:
00048                 typedef typename function_ptr<P1, P2, P3>::type kernel_pointer;
00049         
00050         public:
00055                 kernel(kernel_pointer f);
00056 
00063                 kernel(kernel_pointer p, dim3 grid_dim, dim3 block_dim);
00064 
00065 
00070                 void set_grid_dim(dim3 grid_dim);
00071 
00076                 void set_block_dim(dim3 block_dim);
00077 
00078 
00083                 void operator()(const device &d);
00084 
00090                 void operator()(const device &d, typename forward_param<P1>::type a1);
00091 
00098                 void operator()(const device &d, typename forward_param<P1>::type a1, typename forward_param<P2>::type a2);
00099 
00107                 void operator()(const device &d, typename forward_param<P1>::type a1, typename forward_param<P2>::type a2, typename forward_param<P3>::type a3);
00108 
00109         private:
00114                 template <typename T>
00115                 void put_argument_on_stack(const T &a);
00116         
00121                 void configure_call();
00122                 
00123         private:
00127                 kernel_pointer kernel_;
00128 
00132                 dim3 grid_dim_;
00133 
00137                 dim3 block_dim_;
00138 
00143                 size_t shared_mem_size_;
00144                 
00148                 size_t stack_used_;
00149 };

00152 template <typename P1, typename P2, typename P3>
00153 kernel<P1, P2, P3>::kernel(kernel_pointer f) : kernel_(f), grid_dim_(1), block_dim_(1), stack_used_(0) {
00154 }

00157 template <typename P1, typename P2, typename P3>
00158 kernel<P1, P2, P3>::kernel(kernel_pointer f, dim3 grid_dim, dim3 block_dim) : kernel_(f), grid_dim_(grid_dim),  block_dim_(block_dim), stack_used_(0) {
00159 }

00161 
00162 template <typename P1, typename P2, typename P3>
00163 void kernel<P1, P2, P3>::operator()(const device &d) {
00164         typename function_ptr<void, void, void>::type temp = kernel_;
00165 
00166         configure_call();
00167         
00168         if (cudaLaunch((const char*)temp) != cudaSuccess) {
00169                 throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00170         };
00171 
00172         stack_used_ = 0;
00173 }
00174 
00175 
00176 template <typename P1, typename P2, typename P3>
00177 void kernel<P1, P2, P3>::operator()(const device &d, typename forward_param<P1>::type a1) {
00178         typename function_ptr<P1, void, void>::type temp = kernel_;
00179 
00180         configure_call();
00181 
00182         put_argument_on_stack(a1);
00183 
00184         if (cudaLaunch((const char*)temp) != cudaSuccess) {
00185                 throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00186         };
00187 
00188         stack_used_ = 0;
00189 }
00190 
00191 
00192 template <typename P1, typename P2, typename P3>
00193 void kernel<P1, P2, P3>::operator()(const device &d, typename forward_param<P1>::type a1, typename forward_param<P2>::type a2) {
00194         typename function_ptr<P1, P2, void>::type temp = kernel_;
00195 
00196         configure_call();
00197 
00198         put_argument_on_stack(a1);
00199         put_argument_on_stack(a2);
00200 
00201         if (cudaLaunch((const char*)temp) != cudaSuccess) {
00202                 throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00203         };
00204 
00205         stack_used_ = 0;
00206 }
00207 
00208 
00209 template <typename P1, typename P2, typename P3>
00210 void kernel<P1, P2, P3>::operator()(const device &d, typename forward_param<P1>::type a1, typename forward_param<P2>::type a2, typename forward_param<P3>::type a3) {
00211         typename function_ptr<P1, P2, P3>::type temp = kernel_;
00212 
00213         configure_call();
00214 
00215         put_argument_on_stack(a1);
00216         put_argument_on_stack(a2);
00217         put_argument_on_stack(a3);
00218 
00219         if (cudaLaunch((const char*)temp) != cudaSuccess) {
00220                 throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00221         };
00222 
00223         stack_used_ = 0;
00224 }
00225 
00226 
00227 template <typename P1, typename P2, typename P3>
00228 template <typename T>
00229 void kernel<P1, P2, P3>::put_argument_on_stack(const T &a) {
00230         if (stack_used_+sizeof(T) > 256) {
00231                 throw exception::stack_overflow();
00232         }
00233         if (cudaSetupArgument(&a, sizeof(T), stack_used_) != cudaSuccess) {
00234                 throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00235         }
00236         stack_used_+=sizeof(T);
00237 }
00238 
00239 
00240 template <typename P1, typename P2, typename P3>
00241 void kernel<P1, P2, P3>::configure_call() {
00242         if (cudaConfigureCall(grid_dim_, block_dim_) != cudaSuccess) {
00243                 throw exception::cuda_runtime_error(cudaGetLastError());
00244         }
00245 }
